unnormalised: Ani, konnem tori Bharotantlea robotics-achem fuddar koxem asa mhonn vicharlem, borem? Polle, hanv tuka sangtam, tem khub vhoddlem zatlem! Mhaka ugddas asa hanv 90-chea dasakant bhurgo astana, robotics mhollear kitem-i sci-fi vostu distali tem fokot Pachim-ant ghoddta. Atam, ch चारोंर पळे.
normalised: Ekāṇ, konṇekānnī bhārtāntlyā robotikīchyā bhaviṣyāviṣayī vichārle, barā? Bhāī, mī tumkā sāngtā, tem khūpch vaṭtō vaṭtō! Mhakaṃ yād āssā jevṇaṃ mī navvatīchyā daśakānt bāḷāssāṇ tenṇaṃ robotikī ek dūrai-vidnyānakathāssāṇ fatt paścīmenn ghaddtāssāṇ dislo. Ātā, chārhī-vaṭṭen vaḷi paha.

unnormalised: Mhozo cousin, Rohan, AI-chea zoddlel'lea robotancher IIT Bombay-ant kam korta. To sangta te agri-culture khatir bots vikasit kortat, tuka khobor asa, xetkareank irrigation ani harvesting sarkhea vostu lagun modot korunk. Distea promannem, te prototypes dor disa 5 acres cover korunk xoktat, jem manual labor-a tulna korun insane asa. Plus, Bharat Forge sarkhea companies manufacturing khatir robotics-ant bhari invest kortat. Tanem tanche plants robotic arms ani sarkhea vostu lagun automate kelea efficiency vaddovnk, 30% sarkhem.
normalised: Māzo bhāuo, Rohana, A-I-śakticī robotānncher I-I-T Bombait kāmaṃ karatā. Tem sāṇgtā ki te krīṣī sātī robotānnī viksit kartā, tumkā khabar āssa, śetakaryānnī sīṃchaṇaṃ āṇī faslī kaḍhaṇī sātī maddat karatā. Dissātā ki tye prajārūpānnī daddīṃchā pānch ekarāmcher eka dīssānnī āvaraṇaṃ ghaṭtā, jī mānavī śrāpekṣā khūpch vegḷī āssa. Anikaṃ Bharat Forge sarkhyā kampanyā utpādanā sātī robotikīcher motṭī guṇṭaṇūkaṃ karatā. Tem āpṇī ropaiyānnī robotī hatānnī āṇī vastuānnī svayaṃchalit kartā sāmarthya vāḍhavaṇī sātī, jyesā thirty takke.

unnormalised: Ani tem fokot factories ani farms vixim na. Healthcare vixim chint. Narayana Health-antle Dr. Shetty robotic surgery-chea prayog kortat. Tanem mhaka eka pavtim sanglea ki he robots complex operations 99% accuracy ani minimal invasion lagun korunk xoktat. Tem mind-blowing asa! Tanem tech mhojea grandpak 2022ant knee replacement-ak Rs. 2.5 lakhs kharch lagun vaparlem. Super fast recover zalo.
normalised: Āṇī ti fatt kārakhānyā āṇī śetakṣetrānnī višayī nā. Ārogyāviṣayī vicār kara. Nārāyaṇa Healthacher Doctor Shetty robotī śalyakriyenānnī prayog kartā. Tīnnī mhakaṃ ekdāṃ sāṇgaleṃ kī hī robotānnī navvyāṇnav takke satyatena āṇī kamī ātakramaṇānna jahna prayatī śalyakriyā karu sakta. Tem man lāgaṇeṃ āssa! Tye mhāzyā āzobyācher ghotṭyāchī badalṇī sātī don hazārānnī vīsānnī duśyenna rupyā don point panch lakha bhāḍyānnī vaparaleṃ. Veggim sārkem jātale.

unnormalised: Uprant logistics asa. Flipkart ani Amazon sarkhea E-commerce companies aplea warehouses-ant vostu sort korunk ani package korunk robot vaporta. Hanv kiteim tori vachlem ki te delivery drones Bangalore ani Hyderabad sarkhea xharant 25 meren vapronk yojana kortat. Imagine, tuzo pizza flying robot lagun deliver zata! Tem progress, bhai.
normalised: Mag logistīk āssa. Flipkart āṇī Amazon sarkhyā Ī-vāṇijya kampanyānnī āpṇāchyā godāmānnī vastūnnī vegcāraṇī āṇī veṣṭaṇī sātī ātasahī robotānnī vaparale. Mī konṇe jāgeer vāchleṃ kī te don hazāra vīsānnī pāṇchēnnī Bengalore āṇī Hyderabad sarkhyā śaharānnī māruī utāṇānnī vāparatā. Tumchyā pījjēchī vāyu robotānnī pradāṇ karatā vichār kara! Tī āgratī āssa, bhāi.

unnormalised: Honestly, potential unlimited asa. Defense thaun space exploration meren, robotics Bharot-achea development-ant crucial role vazoitale. Tem Jetsons kiteim-i zanvchena punn ami eka fuddarak vochonk zata zaka robots amchea jivitant integral bhag asat. Current market USD 2.8 billion-acho value asa ani tech CAGR of 22% 2030 meren vaddonk project kelem. So yeah, Bharotantlea robotics-ak khub uzvadd fuddar asa!
normalised: Sachikīne, tākata amāp āssa. Rakṣaṇānnthi sūryamālekhī śodheporaṇṇaparyanta bhārtāchyā vikasānnī robotikī mahattvache bhāgaṃ nāṭāvutā. Tem Jetsons nāhiṃ jhālāpūna, āmyānnī ek bhaviṣyakāḷāka jātaba, jethī robotānnī āmyāchyā jīvanācha anivarīya bhāgaṃ āssa. Sādhyā mānāvāḷī U-S-D don point atth bilīyane asāṇ tye don hazāra vīsānnī tīs parienta twenty-two takke C-A-G-Rnnī vāḍhatalo asāṇ uṭī. Ekāṇ, bhārtānnī robotikīkā ekā ugavāṭe bhaviṣyā asa.
